title:
Why did your Sat paper not cover that our President says he supports the muslim mosque near 9/11 ground zero? There are already 26 mosques in New York. This a slap in the face to all those lives lost. 



It seems all other news sources covered this. Why not you in todays paper?
text:
President Obama said on Saturday that Muslims have the right to build
a mosque near New York's Ground Zero, but he did not say whether he
believes it is a good idea to do so.



Since his statement was made Saturday, it was reported on Page 1A of
the StarNews on Sunday.
